arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Club Brugge: Denis Zakaria and Mohammed Salisu add to list of absentees
arts.sum: AS Monaco head to Belgium on Thursday a little depleted. Denis Zakaria is the latest to succumb to injury as they prepare to open their UEFA Champions League campaign againstâ€¦

Club Brugge's preparation for the first group stage game of the new Champions League campaign has been less than ideal, with the hosts looking to avenge a 1-0 away defeat to RAAL La Louviere on Saturd...
